properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) ORDER BY EMP_ID
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) WHERE DEPT_TITLE = ? ORDER BY EMP_ID
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE LEFT JOIN JOB USING (JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT ON (DEPT_CODE = DEPT_ID) WHERE JOB_NAME = ? ORDER BY EMP_ID
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , EMP_NO , EMAIL , PHONE , DEPT_CODE , JOB_CODE , SAL_LEVEL , SALARY , BONUS , MANAGER_ID , HIRE_DATE , ENT_DATE , ENT_Y/N FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = ?
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPOYEE ORDER BY SALARY DESC NULLS LAST OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT EMP_ID , EMP_NAME , SALARY , DEPT_TITLE , JOB_NAME FROM EMPOYEE ORDER BY SALARY ASC NULLS LAST OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE VALUES ( SEQ_EMPNO , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , N )
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET SALARY = ? , JOB_CODE = ? , DEPT_CODE = ? WHERE EMP_NO = ?
UPATE EMPLOYEE SET ENT_YN = ? , ENT_DATE = ? WHERE EMP_NO = ?
